/a.js(6,8): error TS2339: Property 'foo' does not exist on type 'A'.


==== /a.js (1 errors) ====
    class A {
    	m() {
    		/**
    		 * @type object
    		 */
    		this.foo = arguments;
    		     ~~~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'foo' does not exist on type 'A'.
